DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : The purpose study examine feasibility acceptability 6-week high intensity interval training ( HIIT ) program patient knee OA symptom range mild severe . A secondary purpose evaluate change whole body metabolism induce 6-weeks HIIT . Participants : Fifteen patient ( age 40-70 yr ; BMI 20-35 kg/m² ) symptomatic knee OA Procedures ( method ) : All participant assign single-arm study participant receive 6 week HIIT , deliver twice per week . Outcomes assessed baseline 6 week . The primary outcome evaluate tolerability , feasibility , acceptability , compliance , adherence HIIT program . Secondary outcome include whole body metabolism marker , inflammation , set physical function include knee osteoarthritis symptomatic burden pain , cardiorespiratory fitness , isometric knee extensor flexor strength ( factor associate physical function symptomatic knee OA progression ) , body composition .
DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Interval Training Osteoarthritis , Effects Metabolomics
DOC.criteria: Must exhibit symptomatic knee OA ( WOMAC > 31 ) , radiographic evidence tibiofemoral OA ( 24 KellgrenLawrence scale ) Age 4070 year Body mass index 2035 kg/m² Cleared study physician 12 lead EKG medical history review Individuals diagnose cardiovascular condition restrict exercise Individuals currently meet Department Health Human Services Guidelines Physical Activity ( meet > 150 minute exercise per week ) Individuals currently HIIT Individuals currently participate physical therapy knee OA Individuals currently participate another OA intervention study Received corticosteroid hyaluronic acid injection involve knee previous 3 week schedule intervention Diagnosis gout knee Diagnosis Rheumatoid arthritis Diagnosis Fibromyalgia Other systemic rheumatic disease Severe dementia memory loss Active diagnosis psychosis uncontrolled substance abuse disorder Hospitalization stroke , heart attack , heart failure , surgery block artery past 6 month Diabetics ( medication include exogenous insulin ) Total joint replacement knee surgery , knee surgery , meniscus tear , ACL tear past 12 month On wait list total joint replacement Severely impaired hearing speech Pregnant planning become pregnant next 8 week Inability speak English Serious terminal illness indicate referral hospice palliative care Nursing home residence Inability ride stationary bike Any health problem would prohibit safe participation study .
